title: SWOT Analysis - Strategic Planning for Organizations
headline: Learn about the basics and the organizational applications of the SWOT analysis in this free online management course.
description: A ‘strengths, weaknesses, opportunities and threat’ (SWOT) analysis is a helpful tool that allows your business to examine its strengths, weaknesses, opportunities and threats. Through this course, you will discover a very simple framework for analyzing any internal and external factors affecting your business. You can learn the essential elements of SWOT analysis, its applications and how to take necessary actions after conducting it.

courseDescription:
Globally, enterprises and businesses always look for better ways to increase productivity. For this purpose, companies must be aware of the hundreds of factors that affect their growth. In response to this, Edmund P. Learned, C. Roland Christensen, Kenneth Andrews and William D. Guth designed the SWOT analysis to properly analyze these factors. The acronym SWOT stands for these four important factors: Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities, and Threats. However, why is SWOT analysis important to you? It is one of the most essential analytical and strategic tools organizations use today. Increase your business productivity by working through this course.

We have divided the course content into two modules. The first module describes the basic elements of the SWOT tool, while we dedicate the second module to explaining its essential features. The topics discussed include the connection between strategy and SWOT analysis, essential questions to be addressed while conducting this analysis and taking action afterwards. One of the topics includes a description of the importance of conducting a personal SWOT analysis. By completing this course, you will become equipped with the necessary skills and knowledge to direct your own SWOT analysis.

This course investigates all the elements required to provide you with the basic and essential insights into the SWOT tool. The material is presented in a user-friendly manner, suitable for beginners. We provide some examples of the SWOT tool in the form of illustrations to maintain your interest throughout the course. Exoexcellence Consultants are Karachi-based industrial consultants who provide consultancy to organizations and industries in various areas. Due to their long-term expertise in the corporate sector, consultants of Exoexcellence are well aware of the importance of SWOT analysis in the corporate sector. This course is unique in that it will equip you to become an expert in the SWOT analysis process so why wait when you can learn all about this excellent strategic and analytical tool to grow your business and keep it in check? Enrol in this course today and become more proficient at maintaining the growth of your business.
